page.title: 07COUNTRY HOUSING
page.content: { {Moncreiffe Estate}used to own most of the land in the area but now there are just two tenant farmers.The Forestry Commision manages the woodland.The estate also has kennels for boarding but particularly for breeding alsations. { Kilgraston Estate:}The house was built in the late 18th.Century for the Grant family and was in their hands until 1930 when it was bought by the Society of the Sacred Heart for a boarding and day school.There are now approx.220 pupils,37 teaching staff and 40 people otherwise employed.There are 17 nuns in the Community. The school is one of the main employers in Bridge of Earn.
